Package index

All functions

classify_swepub()
Classify into subject categories using SwePub Web API
classify_umu_ub()
Classify a publication record by Swedish standard subject categories
config()
KTH APIs configuration
issues_swepub()
DiVA publication records from KTH with subject classification issues
kth_belonging_institutional()
Retrieve organizational belonging for a given kthid or accountname at institutional level (assumed to be the second highest hierarchical level)
kth_catalog()
Retrieve catalog data from the KTH Directory API given a slug for an organizational unit
kth_displayname()
Retrieve display name given user (kthid or accountname) using authenticated Profiles v1 API
kth_displayname_legacy()
Retrieve display name given kthid or accountname using the non-authed Profiles v 1.1 legacy API
kth_diva_aliases()
Name aliases for DiVA authors in the KTH DiVA portal
kth_diva_authors()
Retrieve DiVA authors for KTH from the KTH DiVA portal
kth_diva_issues()
Potential data quality issues for DiVA author data
kth_diva_pubs()
Retrieve DiVA publications for KTH from the KTH DiVA portal
kth_profile()
Retrieve data for KTH Profiles
kth_profile_legacy()
Retrieve data for KTH Profiles
kth_profile_school_dep()
Retrieve organizational unit for a given kthid or accountname
kth_projects()
Retrieve data for KTH Projects
kth_projects_people_duplicates()
Duplicates of people in projects
kth_publications()
Retrieve data for KTH Publications
kth_root()
Retrieve root data from KTH Directory API
kth_school_dep()
Retrieve units in the KTH Directory for the first two levels (school, dep)
ldap_search()
Search Active Directory at KTH
parse_diva_name()
Parse a DiVA namestring with bibliographic data
parse_diva_names()
Parse all DiVA namestrings in DiVA publications
status_kthapi()
Status message related to db availability
ug_orcid_kthid_unit()
Run ldap search for kthid/orcid pairs

Developed by Gaël Dubus, Agne Larsson, Markus Skyttner.
